## Installation

You can install the development version of uherotgr from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("UHERO/tgr")
```

This package requires the following environment variables to be set
```
TG_User
TG_Key
```
Edit your `~/.Renviron` or create one using `usethis::edit_r_environ()`.
TG_User should equal the username and TG_Key should equal the API Key needed to
access Title Guarantee's API.


## How to use
`tg()` accepts 2 string parameters: a start date and an end date of the form YYYY-MM-DD
The date range cannot exceed 90 days.
`data <- tg('2024-01-01', '2024-01-03')`
